TopicTitle: Suggestion: Once a maneuver plan is created, switch the guidance to target instead of prograde

Articles.Content:
One of the most frequent mistakes I make is forgetting to switch to target before a maneuver node. I suspect this happens to newbies a lot as well. 

It would also be nice to have an indication, when building the rocket, of how much torque/RCS power is available to the rocket at each stage vs. the max mass and average mass.

The Minimus target ring is very difficult to see. Could you make the rings around targets brighter?

I would like to be able to see the AP and PE of resulting orbit of the maneuver I am planning.

Though the DV is being displayed for the upcoming stages, the mass of fuel and oxidizer is not.
Bug: After completing a burn to lower my periapsis around Minimus, the periapsis kept changing, despite my engines being off.

Bug: After taking off from Minimus, I was unable to get any orbit line. For some reason, it showed my AP as being negative. Upon escaping Minimus SOI, I still had a negative AP showing. Perhaps there is a roll over bug in the AP/PE display?
